title: [Teras Isle, Volcanic Slope]
description: No plant grows on the windy face of V'tull.  If ever there was soil here, wind, rain, and fire cast it down to the rich loam of the grasslands long ago.  A few lizards scuttle about the rocks.

No plant grows on the windy face of V'tull.  If ever there was soil here, wind, rain, and fire cast it down to the rich loam of the grasslands long ago.  A few red lizards alternate between sunning themselves and scuttling about wildly.
